title: Summer Church BBQ
description: Join us for our annual summer BBQ! Enjoy great food, fellowship, and fun activities for the whole family. We'll have games for kids, live music, and plenty of delicious barbecue.

title: Vacation Bible School
description: A week-long adventure for kids ages 4-12! This year's theme is 'Ocean Commotion' where kids will discover that God's love is deeper than the ocean. Includes crafts, games, snacks, and Bible stories.

title: Men's Monthly Breakfast
description: Join the men of our church for a hearty breakfast and encouraging fellowship. This month's topic: 'Being a Godly Father' with guest speaker John Martinez.

title: Women's Summer Tea Party
description: Ladies, join us for an elegant afternoon tea in our beautiful church garden. Enjoy delicious treats, meaningful conversation, and a brief devotion on 'Finding Rest in God's Presence.'

title: Youth Summer Lock-In
description: An all-night event for teens featuring games, movies, pizza, and meaningful discussions about faith and friendship. Bring your sleeping bag and get ready for an unforgettable night!

title: Community Service Day
description: Join us as we serve our community through various service projects including food bank assistance, neighborhood cleanup, and visiting local nursing homes. Lunch will be provided.

title: Baptism Sunday
description: A special service celebrating baptisms. If you're interested in being baptized, please contact Pastor Johnson to schedule a meeting and learn more about this important step of faith.

title: Marriage Enrichment Retreat
description: A weekend retreat designed to strengthen marriages through workshops, devotions, and quality time together. Includes accommodations, meals, and professional marriage counseling sessions.
